lockup.toolTip: Lock-up options determine where the Netflix Logo, CTA, and Tune-in appear.

animation.toolTip: Animation options determine how the ad resolves to endframe.

failover.toolTip: Failover image is a static jpeg, only used in cases when the ad fails to play.

input.toolTip: Background image should match dimensions of the Container.
Title Treatment image should be match dimensions of the Container. Use a transparent PNG.
